languages.text: "Тебе не стоило бы столь веселиться, мон-кай. Знай ты, на кого поднял{mf||а} руку, то перерезал{mf||а} бы сам{mf||а} себе горло, чтобы избежать воздаяния. Но для этого еще будет время".

traits.locale_text: "Тебе не стоило бы столь веселиться, мон-кай. Знай ты, на кого поднял{mf||а} руку, то перерезал{mf||а} бы сам{mf||а} себе горло, чтобы избежать воздаяния. Но для этого еще будет время".

languages.text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If only you knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."
languages.original_text: "Тебе не стоило бы столь веселиться, мон-кай. Знай ты, на кого поднял{mf||а} руку, то перерезал{mf||а} бы сам{mf||а} себе горло, чтобы избежать воздаяния. Но для этого еще будет время".

traits.locale_text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If you only knew who is that you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."
"Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If you only knew who is that you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."
"Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If you only knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."
"Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If you only knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."
"Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If you only knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."

languages.text: «Esa alegría es una necedad, mon-keigh. Si supieras a quiénes has ofendido, te cortarías la garganta para evitar su retribución. Pero ya tendrás tiempo para eso más tarde».
languages.original_text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If only you knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."

traits.locale_text: «Esa alegría es una necedad, mon-keigh. Si supieras a quiénes has ofendido, te cortarías la garganta para evitar su retribución. Pero ya tendrás tiempo para eso más tarde».

languages.text: “幸灾乐祸可不是什么明智的做法，猴子。如果你真的明白自己得罪了什么人，你恐怕会立刻割喉自尽，以免日后遭到报复。不过，你以后会有时间弄明白的。”
languages.original_text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If only you knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."

traits.locale_text: “幸灾乐祸可不是什么明智的做法，猴子。如果你真的明白自己得罪了什么人，你恐怕会立刻割喉自尽，以免日后遭到报复。不过，你以后会有时间弄明白的。”

languages.text: 「その楽観さはいただけないな、モン＝ケイ。お前が誰を怒らせたのか知ったら、報復を恐れてこの場で自分の喉を切り裂くことだろう。だが、その機会は後のためにとっておこう」
languages.original_text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If only you knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."

traits.locale_text: 「その楽観さはいただけないな、モン＝ケイ。お前が誰を怒らせたのか知ったら、報復を恐れてこの場で自分の喉を切り裂くことだろう。だが、その機会は後のためにとっておこう」

languages.text: "Euer flapsiger Ton ist unklug, Chem-Pan-Sey. Wenn Ihr wüsstet, wen Ihr vor den Kopf gestoßen habt, würdet Ihr Euch sofort selbst die Kehle durchschneiden, um der Vergeltung zu entgehen. Aber dafür ist später auch noch Zeit."
languages.original_text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If only you knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."

traits.locale_text: "Euer flapsiger Ton ist unklug, Chem-Pan-Sey. Wenn Ihr wüsstet, wen Ihr vor den Kopf gestoßen habt, würdet Ihr Euch sofort selbst die Kehle durchschneiden, um der Vergeltung zu entgehen. Aber dafür ist später auch noch Zeit."

languages.original_text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If you only knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."

languages.text: « Vous faites preuve d'une jovialité inconsidérée, mon-keigh. Si vous saviez qui vous avez offensé, vous vous trancheriez la gorge sur-le-champ pour échapper au châtiment qui vous attend. Mais cela peut attendre. »
languages.original_text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If only you knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."

traits.locale_text: « Vous faites preuve d'une jovialité inconsidérée, mon-keigh. Si vous saviez qui vous avez offensé, vous vous trancheriez la gorge sur-le-champ pour échapper au châtiment qui vous attend. Mais cela peut attendre. »

languages.text: "Sevinme, başın yanar mon-keigh. Kime münasebetsizlik ettiğini bir bilsen cezasını çekmekten kaçınmak için şuracıkta kendi boğazını kesip canına kıyardın. Lakin onun da vakti gelecek."
languages.original_text: "Your joviality is unwise, mon-keigh. If only you knew who it is you have offended, you would slit your own throat this instant to escape retribution. But there will be time for that later."

traits.locale_text: "Sevinme, başın yanar mon-keigh. Kime münasebetsizlik ettiğini bir bilsen cezasını çekmekten kaçınmak için şuracıkta kendi boğazını kesip canına kıyardın. Lakin onun da vakti gelecek."
